original: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā virajjati, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca virajjati, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi virajjati.
analyzed: sotāpatti magga kkhaṇe dassana aṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā virajjati tad anuvattaka kilesehi ca khandhehi ca virajjati bahiddhā ca sabba nimittehi virajjati

original: Virāgo virāgārammaṇo virāgagocaro virāge samudāgato virāge ṭhito virāge patiṭṭhito.
analyzed: virāgaḥ virāga ārammaṇaḥ virāga gocaraḥ virāge samudāgataḥ virāge ṭhitaḥ virāge patiṭṭhitaḥ

original: nibbānañca virāgo, ye ca nibbānārammaṇatājātā dhammā sabbe virāgā hontīti—virāgā.
analyzed: nibbānam ca virāgaḥ ye ca nibbāna ārammaṇa tā jātāḥ dhammāḥ sabbe virāgāḥ honti iti virāgā
sahajātāni sattaṅgāni virāgam gacchanti iti virāgaḥ maggo

original: Etena maggena buddhā ca sāvakā ca agataṁ disaṁ nibbānaṁ gacchantīti—
analyzed: etena maggena buddhā ca sāvakā ca agatam disam nibbānam gacchanti iti

original: Yāvatā puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ parappavādānaṁ maggā, ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo aggo ca seṭṭho ca pāmokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cāti—
analyzed: yāvatā puthu samaṇa brāhmaṇānam parappavādānam maggāḥ ayam eva ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ aggaḥ ca seṭṭhaḥ ca pāmokkho ca uttamaḥ ca pavaraḥ ca ati
upaṭṭhāna aṭṭhena sammā sati micchā satiyā virajjati
